SELECT MNU_SER AS menuNum , MNU_CD AS menuCd , MNU_NM AS menuNm , MNU_PATH AS menuPath , H_MNU_CD AS upMenuCd , ODR
FROM AT_MNU WHERE USE_YN='Y' ORDER BY ODR ASC

SELECT MNU_SER , MNU_CD , MNU_NM , MNU_PATH , H_MNU_CD , (SELECT COUNT(MNU_CD) FROM AT_MNU WHERE H_MNU_CD = A.MNU_CD ) SUB_CNT , ODR FROM GS_MENU A WHERE USE_YN='Y' AND (H_MNU_CD IS NULL OR TRIM(H_MNU_CD) = '') ORDER BY ODR ASC

SELECT MNU_CD,H_MNU_CD,MNU_NM,ODR,USE_YN FROM ( SELECT MNU_CD,H_MNU_CD,ODR,MNU_NM, USE_YN, LEVEL S FROM AT_MNU START WITH H_MNU_CD IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR MNU_CD = H_MNU_CD ) WHERE S= 2 AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY H_MNU_CD, MNU_CD

SELECT B.MNU_SER , A.MNU_CD , B.MNU_NM , B.MNU_PATH , B.H_MNU_CD , A.AUTH_CD FROM AT_AUTH_MNU_MAPG A LEFT JOIN AT_MNU B ON A.MNU_CD = B.MNU_CD WHERE A.AUTH_CD = #authCd# AND B.USE_YN='Y' ORDER BY B.MNU_CD ASC

SELECT A.MNU_SER , A.MNU_CD , A.MNU_NM , A.MNU_PATH , A.H_MNU_CD , B.AUTH_CD , A.LOW_DEPTH_GB , B.AM_MAPG_NUM FROM AT_MNU A LEFT JOIN AT_AUTH_MNU_MAPG B ON A.MENU_CD = B.MNU_CD AND B.AUTH_CD = #authCd# WHERE A.USE_YN='Y' ORDER BY A.MNU_CD ASC
SELECT MNU_SER , MNU_CD , MNU_NM , MNU_PATH , H_MNU_CD , ODR FROM AT_MNU A WHERE USE_YN='Y' AND H_MNU_CD = #hMnuCd# ORDER BY ODR ASC

SELECT B.MNU_CD , B.MNU_NM , A.SUB_CNT FROM (SELECT /** 사용자 권한별 대메뉴 조회 menuManageDAO.selectUserParentMenu */ SUBSTR(B.MNU_CD, 1, 3) AS PAR_MENU , COUNT(B.MNU_CD) AS SUB_CNT FROM AT_USER A , (SELECT MNU_CD , AUTH_CD , TYPE , USER_ID FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(A.MNU_CD, B.MNU_CD) AS MNU_CD , IFNULL(TYPE, 'MAIN') AS TYPE , IFNULL (A.AUTH_CD, #authCd#) AS AUTH_CD , B.USER_ID FROM (SELECT MNU_CD , AUTH_CD FROM AT_MNU_MAP WHERE AUTH_CD = #authCd#) A FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT MNU_CD, TYPE, USER_ID FROM AT_MNU_USER_MAP WHERE USER_ID = #userId#) B ON A.MNU_CD = B.MNU_CD ) WHERE TYPE != 'DEL' ) B , AT_MNU C , AT_AUTH D WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.STATUS != '4' AND B.MNU_CD = C.MNU_CD AND B.AUTH_CD = D.AUTH_CD AND C.MNU_LVL > 1 AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USER_ID = #userId# GROUP BY SUBSTR(B.MNU_CD, 1, 3) ORDER BY SUBSTR(B.MNU_CD, 1, 3) ) A , AT_MNU B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PAR_MENU = B.MNU_CD ORDER BY B.ODR

SELECT /** 사용자 권한별 메뉴 조회 menuManageDAO.selectUserAuthMenu */ SUBSTR(B.MNU_CD, 1, 3) AS MENU_GROUP , C.MNU_CD , C.MNU_NM , C.MNU_PATH , C.MNU_PARAM , C.H_MNU_CD , C.MNU_TYPE FROM AT_USER A , (SELECT MNU_CD , AUTH_CD , TYPE , USER_ID FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(A.MNU_CD, B.MNU_CD) AS MNU_CD , IFNULL(TYPE, 'MAIN') AS TYPE , IFNULL (A.AUTH_CD, #authCd#) AS AUTH_CD , B.USER_ID FROM (SELECT MNU_CD , AUTH_CD FROM AT_MNU_MAP WHERE AUTH_CD = #authCd#) A FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT MNU_CD, TYPE, USER_ID FROM AT_MNU_USER_MAP WHERE USER_ID = #userId#) B ON A.MNU_CD = B.MNU_CD ) WHERE TYPE != 'DEL' ) B , AT_MNU C , AT_AUTH D WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.STATUS != '4' AND B.MNU_CD = C.MNU_CD AND B.AUTH_CD = D.AUTH_CD AND C.MNU_TYPE = 'M'
AND C.H_MNU_CD IS NULL
AND C.H_MNU_CD IS NOT NULL AND C.MNU_LVL = #mnuLvl#
AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USER_ID = #userId# ORDER BY SUBSTR(B.MNU_CD, 1, 3), C.ODR
